name: Maxpace
description:
This game will be submitted to the Grand Game Jam on 12th of May.

Maxpace is a rhythm game to challenge your reflexes for Android!

Dodge all the asteroids, collect the green nexus and survive until the end of the track!

When collecting 40 nexus, you will be able to use the ultimate! Press it, become giant and destroy everything hat touches you!

It will probably be updated to fix bugs or to add more content. Thanks for coming around!
